```{r}
# Read in dataset
infants <- read.csv("~/Desktop/class/BST210/HW/infants.csv", header=TRUE)

# Exploratory analysis to decide which variables are of interest
scatter.smooth(infants$mage,infants$weight)
scatter.smooth(infants$weight,infants$gained)

# Run simple linear model on weight x gained
infants_lm <- lm(data = infants, gained ~ weight)

summary(infants_lm)$coeff
```
